name: <DOCKERHUB_USERNAME>
hint: Dockerhub secret (This is required to avoid ratelimiting error from dockerhub).

name: <DOCKERHUB_PASSWORD>
hint: Dockerhub secret (This is required to avoid ratelimiting error from dockerhub).

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REPO_USERNAME>
hint: Source code (Git repository) credential is required to setup sample pipeline.

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REPO_PASSWORD>
hint: Source code (Git repository) credential is required to setup sample pipeline.

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REGISTRY_URL>
hint:
Image registry hostname required to create a sample pipeline.
.Examples:
DockerHub: index.docker.io 
Harbor: my-harbor.com/io, 
GCR: gcr.io 
ACR: mypvt.azurecr.io

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REGISTRY_USERNAME>
hint: Image registry credential required to create a sample pipeline.

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REGISTRY_PASSWORD>
hint: Image registry credential required to create a sample pipeline.

name: <JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REGISTRY_ON_SELF_SIGNED_CERT>
hint: Is your JENKINS_SECRET_PVT_REGISTRY_URL on self signed certificate? [options: y or n]

name: <JENKINS_PVC_STORAGE_CLASS_NAME>
hint: Storageclass name associated/available with this k8s cluster for pvc claim during the jenkins server installation process.
